mapper.select: SELECT s.*, sa.name as shop_admin_name, sa.email as shop_admin_email FROM qr_manage_shop s LEFT JOIN qr_manage_shop_admin sa ON s.shop_admin_id = sa.id WHERE s.id = #{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM qr_manage_shop WHERE status = #{status}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qr_manage_shop_review_history (shop_id, reviewer_id, action, comment, created_at) VALUES (#{shopId}, #{reviewerId}, #{action}, #{comment}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT h.*, sa.name as reviewer_name FROM qr_manage_shop_review_history h LEFT JOIN qr_manage_super_admin sa ON h.reviewer_id = sa.id WHERE h.shop_id = #{shopId} ORDER BY h.created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qr_manage_shop_memo (shop_id, admin_id, content, created_at) VALUES (#{shopId}, #{adminId}, #{content}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT m.*, sa.name as admin_name FROM qr_manage_shop_memo m LEFT JOIN qr_manage_super_admin sa ON m.admin_id = sa.id WHERE m.shop_id = #{shopId} ORDER BY m.created_at DESC
